about_the_game:
In the hidden fissure between the rocky mountains, giant gears rotate, clinging to each other. The machines are driven by a waterfall that falls from the top of the rocks. Its burst absorbs the constant clicking and creaking of the gears. The middle of the fissure is networked through a wooden path through which huge furnaces pour heat from themselves. There is a well-equipped workshop at the junction of the two levels where the rigid blacksmith equipment and the delicate books and scrolls fit together peacefully.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
